author: tvolkert
msg: Fixed potential issue with scroll pane skin's optimized scrolling mechanism -- made sure that we only apply the optimization if the background paint style is an opaque color.  For instance, a gradient set as the background paint of a scroll pane skin would preclude us from using the optimization
